gallery.title: Angel Oak Tree
gallery.description: The Angel Oak Tree is a majestic live oak tree that's estimated to be over 400 years old. It's a beautiful and peaceful spot that's perfect for a romantic picnic or a quiet stroll.

gallery.title: Charleston Harbor
gallery.description: There's nothing quite like the romance of sailing on the harbor at sunset. Take in the sights and sounds of the city as you watch the sun go down, and enjoy the company of your loved one.

gallery.title: Waterfront Park
gallery.description: Waterfront Park in Charleston, South Carolina is a popular spot for a romantic stroll and a great place to enjoy the harbor views.

gallery.title: Folly Beach
gallery.description: Since Charleston enjoys a warm climate all year long, you can easily head out to Folly Beach for a romantic picnic for lunch.
